mapper.select: select c.comment_Id , c.board_Id , c.guest_nickname , c.comment_content , c.comment_register_date , m.nickname from comment c left join member m on m.member_id = c.member_id where board_id=#{boardId};
mapper.insert: insert into comment(board_id, member_id, comment_content) values(#{boardId}, #{memberId}, #{commentContent})
insert into comment(board_id, guest_nickname, guest_password, comment_content) values(#{boardId}, #{guestNickname}, #{guestPassword}, #{commentContent})
